sentences.sentence: This bout of self-pity was getting me nowhere.
sentences.translation: 这一阵自哀自怜对我不会有什么好处。

sentences.sentence: He was recovering from a severe bout of flu.
sentences.translation: 他当时正从一次严重的流感中康复。

sentences.sentence: This will be his eighth title bout in 19 months.
sentences.translation: 这将是他19个月中的第八次比赛夺冠。
